Job Title: Senior Business Analyst

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology

Description:
WE ARESoftServe is a leading technology solutions company specializing in software development and consultancy services. With development centers across Eastern Europe and Latin America, we treat our clientâ€™s business as if it were our own and are passionate about delivering efficient, innovative, world-class solutions.
The project aims to consolidate two existing CRMs into one. The user flows may be reworked and any potential data gaps in these flows should be identified. The new system should be documented, and a proposal for work distribution among the teams should be developed.
YOU AREA specialist who has project history of identifying data gaps after a company migrates off of systems and into new onesA specialist who understands how to internally interview employees to identify the data gaps they have that are preventing them from doing their jobsA professional who worked on a project focused on where customer data should be stored and surfaced in order for employees to sell and support customers; as well as give customers a better experience when engaging with the company for a purchase or supportIf you are the one who has an experience with SalesForce.com (SFDC) - and ideally understands how data can feed into it from other systems - would be considered as a great plus!
YOU WANT TO WORK WITHVisioning and scoping of the new systemAnalyzing current CRM flows and redefining them in collaboration with stakeholdersAnalyzing current data usage, identifying data gaps for the identified flows, removing redundant data, finding data sources, providing data mappings from different sources into the new CRM, and possibly creating new charts, dashboards, or recommendations based on data analysisDescribing personas working with CRMsPossibly distributing the scope among several teamsExperience with CRM and Salesforce CRM flows is preferableContinuation of work includes helping with the enrollment of the new system
WE OFFERSupport in your technical and personal growth -> we have a dedicated career plan for all roles in our companyDynamic projects and still the very stable place to workPossibility to take a part in internal and external eventsWe give you access to experienced specialists who are eager to share their knowledge
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, or protected veteran status. SoftServe is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
